articles.title: Biden will announce joint action on reducing European reliance on Russia oil and gas -White House - Reuters.com
articles.description: U.S. national security adviser Jake Sullivan said on Tuesday that U.S. President Joe Biden will announce joint action on enhancing European energy security and reducing its dependence on Russian oil and natural gas.

articles.title: White House press secretary Jen Psaki tests positive for COVID-19 for 2nd time - CBC News
articles.description: White House press secretary Jen Psaki said Tuesday that she has tested positive for COVID-19 for her second time and will not accompany President Joe Biden to Europe for meetings on Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
White House press secretary Jen Psaki said Tuesday that she has tested positive again for COVID-19 and will not accompany President Joe Biden to Europe for meetings on Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
